channel.title: CVE Feed for Fabio Marzocca -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-49182|2023-12-15T14:52:08.191Z -- fabio%20marzocca -- list%20all%20posts%20by%20authors%2C%20nested%20categories%20and%20titles
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fabio Marzocca List all posts by Authors, nested Categories and Titles allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects List all posts by Authors, nested Categories and Titles: from n/a through 2.7.10.
